effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.

short_effect.sun_moon: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
